name: Counts as a card class in a String
text: Adds to the total count of the designated class; the mentioned card/Pluck does not count towards String size.

name: Critical effect
text: Extra effect type that can be resolved when a player is at critical HP.

name: Critical HP
text: 5 HP or less.

name: Damage (deals X additional damage)
text: Additional damage is added to the original damage and that total is the new original damage.

name: Self inflicted damage
text: Damage a player takes as a result of their own card effect.

name: Take X damage
text: Damage is dealt directly to the player, cards can not be used to defend, and all effects regarding targeting and dealt damage are ignored.

name: Defending card
text: When a player designates a card in their play to be the recipient of incoming damage. That card becomes the defending card.

name: Draw
text: Taking the top card of the Main deck and immediately adding it directly to your hand.

name: Deck Out
text: If a player has no cards in their deck at the start of a new Planning Phase, they are considered defeated and all opposing players gain 1 Mettle.

name: Focus
text: The sum of die results used to determine which effect of an Ending or card using Focus will be resolved.

name: Hand
text: Main deck cards each player holds that are ready to use but have not been played. The maximum hand size is 8.

name: Limited effect
text: Extra effect type that can only be used while the card is in play.

name: MAX VARIABLE
text: If MAX VARIABLE is added by an effect without being designated a card type, the player decides the card type it will take the place of.

name: Maximum limit
text: If part of an effect involves a player gaining a resource and that player is already at the limit for that resource, only that part of the effect will not resolve.

name: Mettle
text: The winner of a match is the player who is the first to get 8 Mettle. Players can obtain 1 Mettle each time they defeat a Fighter and the first time they reach 8 Pluck, and 3 Mettle for each foe they defeat.

name: No resource
text: If part of an effect involves removing a resource and that player does not have that resource, only that part of the effect will not resolve. If the first part of an effect is followed by a semicolon, it is a requirement; if not met, the second part will not resolve.

name: Active Effects
text: The effects of a card or Pluck are no longer active if the card is discarded, returned to the hand/Reserve or returned to its respective deck.

name: Reserve
text: Pluck in a player’s possession. Active Pluck count towards a player's Reserve. The maximum Reserve size is 8.

name: Active Pluck
text: Pluck a player has put into play. The maximum number of Active Pluck is 4.

name: String
text: Main deck cards a player can resolve during their turn. The maximum String size is 8.

name: Planning Phase
text: Phase before the Start Phase where players can perform 2 RADs (Resource Altering Decisions).

name: Resource Altering Decisions (RAD)
text: The following are RADs: Drawing from the Main deck, drawing from the Pluck deck, adding a card to a play and swapping a face down card with a card from the hand face up.

name: Weakest Foe
text: Foe with the least HP.

name: Strongest Foe
text: Foe with the most HP.

name: Revealing Cards
text: Flipping a card to show its face to all players. Cards cannot be voluntarily revealed; they must be revealed for card effects, Focus rolls or taking damage. Cards flipped over in order to verify a card’s identity are returned to their original position.

name: Simultaneous actions
text: If multiple players are performing the same action that can not occur simultaneously—like discarding or drawing cards, those actions will occur in the same order that the players are going or would go that round.

name: Piercing damage
text:
Damage type that inflicts direct damage equal to difference between it and a defending card's HP.
Piercing damage ignores the block reaction.

name: Bypassing damage
text: Damage type that deals damage directly to a player. Bypassing damage ignores defending cards and reactions with the exception of block.

name: True damage
text: Damage type that ignores the reactions of a defending card.

name: Focus plus X
text: Player status that increases affected player's Focus by X.

name: Damage plus X
text: Card status that adds 1 additional damage to a card's dealt damage after it's initial damage calculation.

name: Damage minus X
text: Card status that reduces a card's dealt damage after it's initial damage calculation by 1.

name: Extra effects
text: Effects of a card/Pluck that can be resolved without requiring the card to be discarded during the End Phase. Noted by colored markers in the effect text.

name: Trigger effect
text: Extra effect type that can be resolved when the condition noted by the effect is met. Trigger effects can only be resolved during the Start Phase and Active Phase.

name: Enthusiasm
text: Value that determines player priority when player String sizes match. The player with the highest Enthusiasm goes first in that.

name: End Phase
text:
Phase following the end of the last player's turn.
During the End Phase, cards and Pluck that resolved their main effects are sent to their respective discard piles.

name: Start Phase
text: Phase following the Planning Phase and before the first player's turn. During this phase, turn order is determined by player priority.

name: Enthusiasm plus X
text: Player status that increases the affected player's Enthusiasm by X.

name: Enthusiasm minus X
text: Player status that decreases the affected player's Enthusiasm by X.

name: Pull X
text: Effect that allows the play to add X from its respective deck, then shuffle that deck.

name: Unfurl X cards or pluck
text: Reveal the top X of respective deck.

name: Reset
text:
Allows the player to resolve the effects (including limited effects) of a card or Pluck one more time.
Reset floats.

name: Focus minus X
text: Player status that decreases the affected player's Focus by X.

name: Reaction
text: Effects of a card that can only be resolved when that card defends. Noted by reaction tokens.

name: Round
text:
Gameplay starting from the beginning of the Planning Phase to the end of the End Phase.
A game is composed of multiple rounds.

name: Active Phase
text: Gameplay following the Start Phase and proceeding the End Phase. The Active Phase is composed of all player turns.

name: Provoke X card type
text: Effect that selects X foes. Those foes must resolve their noted card type this round with the player as one of the applicable targets.

name: Provoke all card type
text: All foes must resolve their noted card type this round with the player as one of the applicable targets.

name: Place X
text: Putting X under 1 card or Pluck.

name: Placed card or Pluck
text:
Card or Pluck underneath another card/Pluck.
Placed cards do count as being a part of a String or Active Pluck unless noted otherwise. 
If a card or Pluck with placed cards is removed from play all of its placed cards are discarded.

name: Hero ID
text: Indicator of card's or Pluck's group. If a Pluck's Hero ID is not GEN, in order for the Pluck to legally added to a Pluck deck is the have 4 cards with the same Hero ID in the Main deck.
